features: NEW! Poseable Dolls! Arms bend at elbows and rotate at shoulders. Legs bend at knees and rotate at hips.
Silky and wavy brown nylon hair is fun to brush and style!
Pretty blue eyes with long eyelashes. Easy-to-Play: Bluebell can sit, stand, bend her knees and elbows, and rotate her arms, legs, and head!

Wears a pink, frilly frock with a sparkling silver belt, A bright pink bow, a pair of glittery, geometric-print leggings and matching sparkling silver shoes..Her clothes have easy-open closures that make them quick and easy to put on and remove.,Solid plastic construction is durable and easy to clean..Includes: (1) 36 cm doll, (1) t-shirt, (1) skirt, (1) pair of leggings, (1) pair of shoes, (1) bow..Compatible with most 36 cm (14-inch) dolls and accessories including Wellie Wishers and Hearts for Hearts..Recommended dolls for kids age 3 years old and up,,
body.description: It's time to shine with Glitter Girls by Battat! These unique posable 14-inch dolls have an exciting range of sparkly mix-and-match outfits and beautiful, silky hair that's easy to brush and style. Their 14-inch (36.8cm) height makes them perfectly portable and an easy size for small hands. Made from durable plastic Glitter Girls dolls are easy to clean and care for, making them a great gift for 3-year-old girls (and up) who love fashion and, of course, glitter! (Contain small parts, so please supervise younger children!) Available in a range of hair, eye, and skin colors, Glitter Girls encourage children to be themselves, be positive, and “add dazzle to every day!” all while reducing screen time and developing healthy social skills. Create a sparkling world of friendship and adventure with a range of imaginative accessories, toy horses, and 14-inch doll clothes. Let your kids “stand out and be bright” with the Glitter Girls!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Girl dolls great value!
reviews.reviewText: These are adorable, great quality, and a great gift! You have the option to purchase additional outfits separately. They are smaller than the major brand dolls by being 14’ but I view that as a bonus because they take up less space. Have three, and looking forward to purchasing more in the future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice doll and the clothes are well made. I also like when you buy Glitter Girl clothes the shoes are always included. The dolls have long hair that my granddaughters love to brush. I do wish the doll would open and close her eyes. The price is very good allowing me to buy for several granddaughters, two foster children and the church giving tree.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this doll as a Christmas gift. The young lady who received it loves this doll. I like the fact it is warm to the touch, sturdy and very playable. The leggings it came in are a little difficult to get on and off but other then that the clothing is well made. This picture shows the doll after several hours of play and she is still looking new.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of our faves!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Bluebell is too cute! Her outfit is adorable and it was the perfect birthday gift for my 4 year old! We've had her 6 months and she's still holding up well (& my daughter plays with her all the time!) Her hair comes in pigtails, which we chose to keep in, and she still looks cute! Hair hasn't matted up or tangled yet, which is great! 100% recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The only problem is that the hair gets matted
reviews.reviewText: The dolls are cute and of good quality. The only downside to it is that the hair gets matted. Kids are gonna want to play with the doll's hair! I had to cut the hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: She is flexible and dressed so cute. My granddaughter loves her eyes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the size of this doll. My daughter has brown hair and blue eyes. Wanted to get her a mini me doll for Xmas. Bluebell is adorable and is the perfect doll for young girls. My daughter is 4 and will FLIP when she gets her for Christmas, they even have similar names!! 😭

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful doll & reasonable price, but skin tone is off
reviews.reviewText: My 7-year-old daughter was requesting another American Girl Wellie Wisher doll, but specifically wanted a doll with hair she could style. I was looking for a 14" doll that would be compatible with the Wellies and I'm so glad I found these new Glitter Girls. Battat really got the look and design right with their posable Glitter Girl collection. This doll is a Christmas present, so it hasn't been opened or played with yet. Her eyes are bright blue and the lashes are a nice touch. Her outfit seems well made with quality materials. One thing that surprised me was the darkness of her complexion. Her skin color is much darker in person than my daughters' Wellies and Disney princess dolls. Its even more noticable with the blonde hair, green eyed Glitter Girl I bought my 4-year-old. It looks like they have tans and reminds me of my Malibu Barbie from childhood. Its not a deal breaker for me since I'm mostly buying for the hair, but there is a clear difference between the Amazon photos and what I received. Overall, I'm very happy with this purchase and can't wait to hear what my daughters think. I really like the price compared to spending $60 on a Wellie Wisher, and will definitely be purchasing more Glitter Girls and accessories in the future.11/15/2020 UPDATE:My daughter LOVES this doll and plays with it daily.The Glitter Girl's hair is fun to style, and still in great shape after almost 2 years. With a wired doll brush and water spray we have NOT had a problem with hair coming out.The doll is easy to dress, which prevents damage to it's clothes and allows for more independent play. Some glitter has worn off of the shoes, but otherwise the outfit is still in good shape.The only thing missing is underwear. My daughter borrows the Wellie's underwear when dressing the doll in skirts and dresses. Underwear would be a nice addition or accessory pack in the future.Last Christmas we added the horses, stable and several outfits to our families GG collection. This year we will be getting 2 new dolls and some more outfits.I highly recommend Glitter Girls! Durable, easy to dress and reasonably priced for little kids (age 3 to 7). Fun, creative play for older girls who like to style hair, outfits and pose dolls (age 8+).
Gave as gift to my Niece. I bought an additional set of clothes for the doll any my niece has been playing with it ever since she got it. Doll is cute and seems well made.
